dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits and is commonly used for training various image processing systems.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Karen Simonyan
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a dataset of Zalando's article images, intended as a drop-in replacement for the original MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:creator: Kaiming He
Xiangyu Zhang
Shaoqing Ren
Jian Sun
dcterms:description: Cifar-10 is a dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class, used for image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Cifar-10
